org.apache.cassandra.locator

Class DynamicEndpointSnitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.locator.AbstractEndpointSnitch
      • org.apache.cassandra.locator.DynamicEndpointSnitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicEndpointSnitchMBean, IEndpointSnitch, ILatencySubscriber

    public class DynamicEndpointSnitch
extends AbstractEndpointSnitch
implements ILatencySubscriber, DynamicEndpointSnitchMBean
    A dynamic snitch that sorts endpoints by latency with an adapted phi failure detector

      Returns whether for a range query doing a query against merged is likely to be faster than 2 sequential queries, one against l1 followed by one against l2.
